mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_INFO ( COLLECT_TIME, SEQ, MOVIE_RANK, MOVIE_NM, MOVIE_RESERVE, SCORE, OPEN_DAY, REG_ID, CHG_ID ) VALUES( #{collect_time}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.SEQ),0)+1 FROM MOVIE_INFO A WHERE A.COLLECT_TIME = #{collect_time}), #{movie_rank}, #{movie_nm}, #{movie_reserve}, #{score}, #{open_day}, #{reg_id}, #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT COLLECT_TIME, SEQ, MOVIE_RANK, MOVIE_NM, MOVIE_RESERVE, SCORE, OPEN_DAY, REG_ID, CHG_ID FROM MOVIE_INFO WHERE COLLECT_TIME LIKE #{collect_time}||'%' ORDER BY MOVIE_RANK ASC
